clues.text: "And like a good neighbor", this co. is there at No. 37, "taking an active stance against texting while driving"

clues.response: the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

rounds.text: "Modern bourgeois society... is like the sorcerer who is no longer able to control the powers... called up by his spells"
